attributes.action: Stand down and call for a general election immediatly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our country is a shambles!
Industries lie in ruins, thousands and thousands are out of work, British citizens are losing their homes, people are dying!

If there is one thing that it crystal clear from the results of the european election, it is that this country has no confidence in a labour government and in you as PM.
The time has come to step down and call an election.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
